data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ceiba.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ceiba, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Ceiba, Puerto Rico who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ceiba, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Ceiba a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ceiba
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ceiba, Ceiba, Puerto Rico.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Ceiba.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ceiba to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ceiba, Puerto Rico a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
